name: star_one_count
displayName: Levels beaten at one star or better.

name: star_five_count
displayName: Levels beaten at five stars or better.

name: star_max_count
displayName: Levels beaten at the maximum difficulty.

name: max_players
displayName: Most coop players in a single game.

name: max_upgrade
displayName: The highest upgrade level that has been achieved for any upgrade type.

name: death_count
displayName: The number of times a player has died.

name: enemy_count
displayName: The maximum enemies that have been alive on screen at one time.

name: kill_count
displayName: The total number of enemies a player has killed across all games.

name: score_total
displayName: The total points earned across all games.
